name: The Base
description:
PC only tower defence inspired by oldschool RTS games. Build up your defence in realtime under the constant pressure of creeps.
Your mission is to clear planets with hostile monsters to prepare these planets for colonization.

  • PC only game. Focusing on PC platform allows us to create unique tower defence for Steam users.
  • Many build strategies and playstyles.
  • Non-standart payment for creeps elimination mechanics.
  • Creeps attack from all sides in realtime.
  • Turrets, traps, transport, platforms and more items to protect the base.
